active_learning.discussion_prompt: In a group discussion, debate the potential risks to impartiality in CB operations (e.g., commercial pressures or shared personnel with auditees) and propose mitigation strategies aligned with ISO/IEC 27006. Support your arguments with examples from real-world cybersecurity certification scandals.
active_learning.peer_teaching: Explain the key concepts to a partner without using technical jargon.
active_learning.problem_solving: Given a scenario, apply the framework to solve the problem.

distractor_protocol.step: Distractor 1: Common misconception (e.g., confuse ISO 27006 with 27001 requirements).
Distractor 2: Related but incorrect concept (e.g., mix with ISO 17021-1 general rules).
Distractor 3: Partial truth/exaggeration (e.g., auditor competence without context experience).
